General.Name: Danen Technology Corp
General.Description: Danen Technology Corporation engages in manufacture and sale of solar ingots and wafers for photovoltaic applications worldwide. It offers multi-crystalline solar wafers, ingots, and bricks; and customized OEM services. The company serves solar cell companies. Danen Technology Corporation was founded in 2007 and is headquartered in Taoyuan, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 599, Huan-Nan Rd., Taoyuan City, Taiwan, 328
